note:
Omnivorous reader, given to tumbling down research rabbit holes. Into fractals, cycling, piano, photography.
Past hustles include working for an opera company and a music conservatory, writing on opera and music, wrangling websites, and (way back) driving tractor and operating a roller coaster at an amusement park.
Farm brat living on Vancouver Island and grappling with angst about the environment and climate change. Oxford comma warrior. Caregiver for a sourdough starter named Quasimodough.
